title: Automotive Tools Quiz
description: How well do you know automotive tools and car maintenance equipment? Test your knowledge!

questions.question: Which tool is a cross-shaped wrench with four different socket sizes used for removing lug nuts?
What is a torque wrench used for?
options: Tightening bolts to a specific, precise amount of force

questions.question: Which tool has a ratcheting mechanism and interchangeable sockets for turning nuts and bolts?
What is an OBD-II scanner used for?
options: Reading diagnostic trouble codes from a vehicle's computer

questions.question: Which tool is used to grip and turn oil filters during an oil change?
What are jumper cables used for?
options: Connecting a dead car battery to a charged one to jump-start the vehicle

questions.question: Which tool is used to check the specific gravity of battery acid to test a car battery's charge?
What is a breaker bar used for?
options: Providing extra leverage to loosen very tight or seized bolts

questions.question: Which specialized pliers have locking jaws that clamp onto objects and stay locked without hand pressure?
What is a spark plug socket?
options: A deep socket with a rubber insert designed to grip and remove spark plugs

questions.question: Which device is used to safely bleed air from brake lines when replacing brake fluid?
What is a combination wrench?
options: A wrench that adjusts to any size
A wrench that combines two different tools
A wrench with an open end on one side and a closed (box) end of the same size on the other

questions.question: Which tool is a funnel-like device used to add fluids to a car without spilling?
What is a ball joint separator (pickle fork) used for?
options: Separating ball joints and tie rod ends from their sockets

questions.question: Which measuring device has a dial or digital display and is used to check tire tread depth?
